src:
女学生网络卖淫案 大部分嫖客都是当地官员和政客

02 Nov 2019, 02:18

【打横Tribun新闻网10月31日讯】西爪省打横市女学生网络卖淫案，大部分嫖客据称都是当地官员和政客。警方是从其中一名被拘捕的卖淫女薇（22岁）口中得知此事的。薇是年龄最大的卖淫女，她和另4名女学生艾（17岁）、菲（18岁）、芬（16岁）和莉（17岁）一起从事卖淫工作。周四（10月31日），薇对警察说：“周末最多接客两次，平日只接客一次。客人是打横市官员、政客和商人。”她坦承虽然刚从事卖淫工作两个月，但已接客很多次，几乎每天都接客。3名男子给这些女孩在社交媒体上介绍嫖客。他们都已被警方拘捕。援引《罗盘》新闻网报道，她说：“一次收费50到70万盾，包一天270万盾，这已经包含了酒店房间。”周三（10月30日），打横市警方破获一起少女网络卖淫案。3名老鸨和5名卖淫女在某家酒店房间接客时被警察抓捕。警方接到某家酒店报警，说有几个举止可疑的女子，有几个男子轮流进入她们的房间。
text:
Female student online prostitution. Most of the clients are local officials and politicians.

02 Nov 2019, 02:18

[Thank Tribun News Network October 31st] West Java Province, the city of Yokohama female students online prostitution, most of the hackers are all local officials and politicians. The police learned of the incident from one of the arrested prostitutes (22 years old). Wei is the oldest prostitute woman. She is engaged in prostitution with four other female students, Ai (17 years old), Philippine (18 years old), Fen (16 years old) and Li (17 years old). On Thursday (October 31), Wei said to the police: "The maximum number of pick-ups on the weekend is twice. Only pick up passengers on weekdays. The guests are playing Hengyang officials, politicians and businessmen." She admits that although she has just engaged in prostitution for two months, she has Pick up many times and pick up passengers almost every day. Three men gave these girls a hacker on social media. They have all been arrested by the police. Citing the "Compass" news network report, she said: "A charge of 500,000 to 700,000 rupiah, a package of 2.7 million rupiah a day, which already contains the hotel room." Wednesday (October 30), hit the city police to crack a girl network prostitution case. Three old ladies and five prostitutes were arrested by the police while picking up guests in a hotel room. The police received a report from a hotel and said that there were several women who were suspicious and several men took turns to enter their room.
